awards.summary: Received the scholarship for being amongst the top 10 Computer Science exam candidates, Allowing me to enter University a year earlier
awards.title: 2014 Computer Science Scholarship

basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.name: Tyler Hale
basics.summary: Part of building a Garage Startup while simultaniously going to the University • Developer who likes to explore different areas of building products • Typically found trying out automated and faster ways to improve: CI/CD, machine infrastructure, scalability and anything else that causes developer friction • Actively jumping into new and existing projects which require leadership, management, and problem solving • Heavily involved in building infrastructure that supports Nvidia GPUs, including effective storage and data science stacks that use them • Follower of the Twelve-Factor App and the CNCF for Dev-Ops practices

courses: COMP316 Artificial Intelligence Techniques and Applications
COMP317 Design and Analysis of Algorithms

projects.description: A Containerized GPU Data-Science stack for Scion to process its New Zealand LiDAR Data
projects.name: LUCE

highlights: Development Lead for LUCE, a containerized GPU data-science stack for Scion to process its New Zealand LiDAR data
Presentation paper for the LUCE stack, Where I am referenced: https://www.slideshare.net/slideshow/embed_code/key/LpWNUVquEE8B5A
Part of product management; working on strategy, feature definition, road-mapping and release process
Collaborated with external technology leaders and customers in R&D projects
Directed release pipelines for components and products
Developed data processing integrations into distributed storage including HDFS and Ceph
Developed infrastructure projects requiring configuration as code and custom Ansible modules
Created and managed Kubernetes clusters on AWS using Terraform and Baremetal using Rancher
Experience with Nvidia K1, X1, and X2 ARM based development kits
Implemented the C++ Packaging system and management of Cuda libaries using Conan
Developed internal dashboards for metrics and tracking
Developed internal tools for automation, build processes and code static analysis
work.position: Software Developer, Development Lead, DevOps Consultant, Sales Engineer
work.summary: One of the first to join, seeing the company grow from its first customer to multiple
